snippet.title: Simona's Requiem
snippet.description:
Simona's Requiem is a retro styled platformer Inspired by old action adventure games but with a modern touch. Pick up the scythe as Simona and and slash your way to the Fisher King who has hidden behind the moon.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1482430/Simonas_Requiem/

#metroidvania
